Description:
Detects suspicious child processes of the Veeam service process. This could indicate potential RCE or SQL Injection.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Child Process Of Veeam Dabatase
Query:
sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((parent_process_path like '%\sqlservr.exe' and parent_command_line like '%veeamsql%') and (((process_path like '%\cmd.exe' or process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe' or process_path like '%\wsl.exe' or process_path like '%\wt.exe') and (command like '%-ex %' or command like '%bypass%' or command like '%cscript%' or command like '%downloadstring%' or command like '%http://%' or command like '%https://%' or command like '%mshta%' or command like '%regsvr32%' or command like '%rundll32%' or command like '%wscript%' or command like '%copy %')) or (process_path like '%
et.exe' or process_path like '%
et1.exe' or process_path like '%
etstat.exe' or process_path like '%
ltest.exe' or process_path like '%\ping.exe' or process_path like '%	asklist.exe' or process_path like '%\whoami.exe')))
